22.3 Short Citation Form (p.249)

Short citation forms for Tribal Nations follow the corresponding short citation forms for sources of the same type. Thus, see rule 10.9 for Tribal cases; rule 11 for Tribal constitutions; rule 12.10 for Tribal codes and orders, ordinances, and resolutions; and rule 21.17(a) for Tribal treaties.
